p: The majority of analyses on P. amalago EOs have been done on leaves, and are summarized in Table 6. Although from limited evidence, there seems to be a prevalence of sesquiterpene hydrocarbons such as bicyclogermacrene, β-phellandrene and germacrene D, with significant amounts of monoterpene hydrocarbons such as α-pinene, and some sesquiterpenoids such as spathulenol [ 50].
